subject: Football
College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: David Shaw will attempt to keep Stanford on the path forged by his predecessor, Jim Harbaugh, who left for the N.F.L. after guiding the Cardinal to a 12-1 record.
snippet: David Shaw will attempt to keep Stanford on the path forged by his predecessor, Jim Harbaugh, who left for the N.F.L. after guiding the Cardinal to a 12-1 record.
